speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Vittorio Agnoletto on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs on the human rights and democracy clause in European Union agreements ( 2005/2057(INI) ) ( A6-0004/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mr Vittorio Agnoletto on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs on the human rights and democracy clause in European Union agreements ( 2005/2057(INI) ) ( A6-0004/2006 ).
agenda_item: The Human Rights and Democracy Clause (debate)
